lead_paragraph: Aston Villa took another step towards their almost inevitable relegation on Tuesday when they were beaten 3-1 by Everton at Villa Park where the home fans walked out in protest long before the end.

headline.print_headline: Home Fans Protest as Everton Push Villa Closer to Drop
headline.main: Home Fans Protest as Everton Push Villa Closer to Drop
